name: Geronimo demo demo
description:
Geronimo is a fast paced platformer that is in a cyberpunk world. This isa piece of the first chapter. The full and comeplete demo will be the entire first chapter. Now what are you waiting for. Jump in and smash some robots! Please notice that this very early in devlopment so expect bugs and weird problems.

C to interact.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1KJEk-EZMmDF9DJKMK5OCQ has made all the music, so big credits to them.
